Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    net.sf.mpxj.common.RateHelper.convertFromHours(ProjectFile, BigDecimal, TimeUnit)
    pass instance of ProjectProperties or other TimeUnitDefaultsContainer instead of ProjectFile
    net.sf.mpxj.common.RateHelper.convertFromHours(ProjectFile, double, TimeUnit)
    pass instance of ProjectProperties or other TimeUnitDefaultsContainer instead of ProjectFile
    net.sf.mpxj.common.RateHelper.convertFromHours(ProjectFile, Rate, TimeUnit)
    pass instance of ProjectProperties or other TimeUnitDefaultsContainer instead of ProjectFile
    net.sf.mpxj.common.RateHelper.convertToHours(ProjectFile, Rate)
    pass instance of ProjectProperties or other TimeUnitDefaultsContainer instead of ProjectFile
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.getNextCalendarUniqueID()
    use ProjectFile.getCalendars().getNextUniqueID()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.getNextRelationUniqueID()
    use ProjectFile.getRelations().getNextUniqueID()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.getNextResourceID()
    use ProjectFile.getResources().getNextID()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.getNextResourceUniqueID()
    use ProjectFile.getResources().getNextUniqueID()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.getNextTaskID()
    use ProjectFile.getTasks().getNextID()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.getNextTaskUniqueID()
    use ProjectFile.getTasks().getNextUniqueID()
    net.sf.mpxj.Resource.setAvailableFrom(LocalDateTime)
    this attribute is now derived from the resources' availability table
    net.sf.mpxj.Resource.setAvailableTo(LocalDateTime)
    this attribute is now derived from the resources' availability table
    net.sf.mpxj.Resource.setMaterialLabel(String)
    use setUnitOfMeasure
    net.sf.mpxj.Resource.setMaxUnits(Number)
    create entries in the availability table to set this value
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.updateAssignmentUniqueCounter()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.updateCalendarUniqueCounter()
    use ProjectFile.getResources().updateUniqueIdCounter()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.updateResourceUniqueCounter()
    use ProjectFile.getResources().updateUniqueIdCounter()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.updateTaskUniqueCounter()
    use ProjectFile.getTasks().updateUniqueIdCounter()
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectConfig.updateUniqueCounters()
    use ProjectFile.updateUniqueCounters
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectEntityContainer.validateUniqueIDsForMicrosoftProject()
    no longer required as the MSPDI and MPX writers handle this dynamically without changing the original schedule
    net.sf.mpxj.ProjectFile.validateUniqueIDsForMicrosoftProject()
    no longer required as the MSPDI and MPX writers handle this dynamically without changing the original schedule
